items.sentence: Tom and Mary were planning on doing that yesterday.
Tom isn\'t going to let Mary go to Boston with you.
Tom isn\'t likely to be as busy as you think he is.
I assume you\'ve graduated from high school by now.
I don\'t think that Tom knows much about Australia.
Tom isn\'t the only one here who can play the oboe.
Tom isn\'t very likely be punished for what he did.
Tom isn\'t very likely to go to Boston next summer.
You\'re not going to tell anyone about this, right?
You\'re not the only one here who can speak French.
I suspect Tom and Mary are planning to get married.
Tom has actually been doing that for some time now.
It may not be as easy to do as you think it\'ll be.
Tom certainly didn\'t say what you thought he said.
Tom suggested going to another supermarket instead.
Tom takes his teddy bear with him wherever he goes.
I\'m not to blame for everything that has happened.
I\'d never have met Tom if it hadn\'t been for you.
We only have enough time to do one of those things.
Tom knew Mary wasn\'t likely to be able to do that.
